featured.text: Applicants should meet the requirements: Interested candidates please apply immediately with (1) Taiwan citizen resume and mail to P.O. box 594.

definition.zh_def: 申請者，指向某個職位或機會提交申請的人。
definition.en_def: Individuals who apply for a position, opportunity, or admission.
definition.example: The company received many applicants for the job opening.
